name: ./YRW
description:
"Yeah Doc, Yrw is great, she works just fine! Only problem, I updated her yesterday and now she only has one file in her drive. Luckily, it was a cat pic."

./YRW is a Metroidvania game where you can only retain one upgrade at a time. Choose carefully which one you will need to continue exploring and find the exit.

Commands:

  • -WASD or arrows for moving
  • E or Left Shift for Action
  • R to reset
  • Controller support enabled

Credits:

All developement was done by Ulleri Alessandro.
All artwork and sound design by Ulleri Francesco aka Hoodead (https://twitter.com/_hoodead_)

Made during GMTKJam 2019.
(in case you are wondering, yrw is "only one" in Base 64, which is the theme of the jam).
